title: Lapis Development Sample
description:
Blue dominates.  Plain weave or Twill variation.
Similar to Pomegranate. Blue, drk teal & olive warp. Lt. blue, Lt. teal & blue/green metallic weft. Plain weave variation. Tag \"#5\" attached to piece.  Inside mat folder with 99.1.1213.20, 21, 22.  Larsen descriptive info within.  \"H-8B\" written on front of folder. (blue, green, metallic)
